import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' function Post(props) { const [userFullName,setuserFullName]=useState() let history=useHistory(); useEffect(() => { if(!localStorage.getItem('Token')) { history.push('./login') } getData() }, []) const getData=()=>axios({method: 'post',url:'http://localhost:5000/getPost'}).then(result=>{ props.setresultAllPost(result.data); getUserFullName() }); const getUserFullName=()=>axios({ method:'post', url:'http://localhost:5000/getUserFullName', }).then(result=>{ setgetUserFullName(result.data) console.log(result.data) }) /// code for likes const handleLike=(postId,userId)=>{ axios({ method:'Post', url:'http://localhost:5000/like', data:{postId,userId} }).then(result=>{ props.setresultAllPost(result.data) }) } // code for unlike const handleUnLike=(postId,userId)=>{ axios({ method:'Post', url:'http://localhost:5000/unlike', data:{postId,userId} }).then(result=>{ props.setresultAllPost(result.data) }) } return ( <> { ((props.resultAllPost).length!==0)?props.resultAllPost.map(val=>
{val.title}
{val.category}
{ val.userId }
{val.date} {val.time}
  • Share
  • Flag
  • 4 Comments
  • handleLike(val._id,JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('LogInUser'))._id)} > Likes
    • {val.like.length}
  • handleUnLike(val._id,JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('LogInUser'))._id)}> Unlike
    • {val.unlike.length}
) :'' } ) } export default Post
